coupons.heading: Learn Git Commands
coupons.author: Peter A
coupons.description:
Learn about Project Version controll with the tool named Git.  Git enables you to work on a project with multiple people. It's a tool often used by software developers and other tech folks. Why shouldn't your project include a work log, be able to switch back and forth in time and more?

In this course you learn about Git through the command line. It's a concise course that teaches you to get started with Git. No advanced complicated commands, just getting things done.

If you want to learn the Git command line, enroll in this course
coupons.title: Git Command Line for Beginners

coupons.heading: Everything you need to know to start Building Projects with Adobe Audition 2022
coupons.author: Josh Werner
coupons.description:
Have you always wanted to learn how to Edit Audio but don't know where to start?

Would you like to make amazing Videos and bring your ideas to life?

Then Adobe Audition 2022 Projects is for you!

Hi, I’m your instructor Josh Werner and I’ll be leading you through this course.

Audio Editing is an in-demand skill in 2022.

The course begins with the basics. 

I'll take you through everything you need to know to start Editing Audio like an expert.

You'll learn all the fundamentals of Adobe Audition 2022.

This is great for students starting or for Audio Editors that need a refresher course on Adobe Audition 2022.

There are no requirements necessary to enroll I only ask that you come open minded and ready to learn

Feel Free to look through the course description and checkout some of my preview videos

The course is packed with over 2 hours of hands-on tutorials
